oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Amelia Post Oral History Interview, 2011 August 9
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Amelia Post conducted on August 9, 2011 by Annette Pilcher as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Amelia Post discusses flood relief for the immigrant community at Millwood Manor and other areas in South Nashville.
The complete interview and transcript is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Post, Amelia--Interviews
